Posts.Content: Please Help !! Im a 44 yr old women who has had upper back / shoulder pain for about a yr. GP keeps giving me pain killers and Naproxin for it,  i have also had steriod injections.  The pain has become worse and is now in my left breast for a few weeks, its like a stinging stabbing pain, in my boob , armpit and down my left arm so went back to GP on Friday , he then examined my breast and has found 2 lumps ! ( which i cant feel btw ) and given me a urgent refferal to the breast cancer clinic. Im a mum of 2 beautiful boys and im convinced i now have BC now, i also have noticed a tiny blood type mark on that same breast at the bottom and this has been there for about 6 months.  So i have my appointment today at 3pm and have not slept a wink all night. Can someone pls help me with any advice ?  Does anyone on here have a similar story ? Have i left it too long ?  Im just so scared and my husband is too , im frightened of what im going to hear today. Thanks and all you brave amazing ladies keep being amazing. Nikki
Posts.Title: PLS HELP !!! BREAST CANCER WORRY

Posts.Content: Hiya,  Thank you for your kind words , im just so scared abt this pain. I hope the hospital will help me today , im taking co codamol and Naproxin like sweeties !! I cant feel these 2 lumps my GP found , i was in such a state Friday i just took the referral letter and needed to get home.  Pls god ill have good news later to put on here but i have a very weird feeling its gona be bad Thanks again   Nikki xx
Posts.Title: PLS HELP !!! BREAST CANCER WORRY

Posts.Content: Hiya,  Thank you for your kind words , im just so scared abt this pain. I hope the hospital will help me today , im taking co codamol and Naproxin like sweeties !! Posts.Title: PLS HELP !!! BREAST CANCER WORRY

Posts.Content: Hiya,  Yes just home, ALL IS OK !! Just cyst and the pain is all muscular which i need to see my gp for.  I can now breath , Thank you to everyone who have been so lovely and supportive.  All you ladies are truly AMAZING X TAKE CARE  NIKKI XXX

Posts.Title: PLS HELP !!! BREAST CANCER WORRY

Posts.Content: Hiya, Your so brave , i really admire you hun , bless your heart. I go to the breast C clinic today , im so scared. You know when you know something is wrong.  The pain is my main problem, had shoulder pain for over a year and my GP has just been giving me pain killers Now its developed into my left breast , armpit and arm. God only knows whats wrong , hope they can get me out of pain today  Take Care xx
Posts.Title: I don’t understand why I’ve needed two needle biopsies and then a...

Posts.Content: Hiya,  Oh bless you , what a worrying time for you. May i ask what your symptoms was ?  Im about to go to the breast cancer clinic today as been going mad with pain and have 2 lumps according to my GP ! I cant feel them ???  Could you feel your lumps may i ask ?  Take Care and i wish you all the luck xxxx Nikki
